title: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Novomykhaylivka, Kostyantynivka, Urozhayne of Donetsk region. Russian aviation...
content: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Novomykhaylivka, Kostyantynivka, Urozhayne of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Krasnohorivka, Oleksandropil, Vodyane and Vuhledar of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
